title: Mauricio Pochettino Manager Profile, Record & Stats | Premier League
snippet: Under Pochettino, in the second half of 2012/13, Southampton achieved impressive victories over reigning Premier League champions Manchester City as well as Liverpool and Chelsea. The following campaign proved even more successful as Pochettino led Saints to eighth, matching their highest Premier League finish. Pochettino was chosen by Tottenham Hotspur to replace Tim Sherwood as head coach for the 2014/15 season.
